channel.title: Seeds of Wisdom on Osho - The complete works of Osho

image.title: Osho - The complete works of Osho

item.description: < Previous | Contents â€ŒCHAPTER 1 PREFACE I too am a farmer and I sowed some seeds. They sprouted and now flowers have come to them. My whole life is filled with the fragrance of these flowers and because of this fragrance now I am in a different world. This fragrance has given me a new birth, and now I am no longer that which is seen by ordinary eyes.
